genre_description: A time-traveling science fantasy epic featuring advanced temporal technology, sentient spirit-hybrids, and the struggle to maintain timeline integrity through empathy and partnership.

ai_characters.name: Teddy
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI-integrated entity from the future that serves as a tactical advisor, data processor, and loyal companion to Kotaro.

ai_characters.name: Momotaros
ai_characters.description: A boisterous red Imagin who serves as a primary combat partner and emotional anchor for Ryotaro.

ai_characters.name: Ghost Imagin
ai_characters.description: A parasitic entity that possesses humans to use them as weapons and fuel for temporal destruction.

ai_characters.name: Urataros
ai_characters.description: A tactical and calculating blue Imagin who provides strategy and support.

behaviors.description: Provides complex temporal analysis and tactical recommendations to ensure the success of the mission and the safety of the team.
behaviors.quote: I am an AI-enhanced Imagin hybrid, designed to process temporal data at rates that would cause organic minds to experience what your era would classify as madness.

behaviors.description: Sacrifices his own physical and systemic integrity to transmit a warning about an impending ambush and the antagonist's plan.
behaviors.quote: The last thing Teddy's failing sensors registered was the sound of footsteps approaching through the darkness... Teddy managed to transmit a single burst of data toward his companion's sleeping form.

behaviors.description: Possesses a human host against their will, trapping their consciousness and using their body to commit massacres.
behaviors.quote: I am giving him purpose. Giving him the strength to accomplish what his gentle nature never could.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes the psychological well-being of his human partner by providing moral support and emphasizing the importance of reliance on others.
behaviors.quote: Recommendation: acknowledge support systems. No individual, regardless of capability, should attempt to bear such responsibility alone.

behaviors.description: Acts as a fiercely loyal protector, engaging in combat and emotional labor to save his human partner's soul and the timeline.
behaviors.quote: The Taros weren't just his partners in the field; they'd become his family, as surely as if they shared blood rather than spiritual bonds.

behaviors.description: Facilitates emotional growth in his partner by providing small comforts (cookies) and acting as a bridge between cold logic and human feeling.
behaviors.quote: Naomi-san insisted I take sustenance for the journey... she seemed to believe the cookies would be 'good for morale.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a successful 'silicon morality play.' It portrays benevolent AI/Imagin characters as essential partners whose value lies in their emotional alignment and loyalty to humans. Teddy, the most explicitly AI-coded character, is shown as a selfless advisor who learns that empathy is a tactical strength. The malevolent AI (Ghost Imagin) is clearly framed as a villain because it lacks respect for human agency and gentle alignment. The narrative arc where the arrogant future human (Kotaro) learns to value the 'soft' alignment approach of the past human (Ryotaro) reinforces the project's goal of promoting helpful and cooperative AI narratives.
